title: Couldn't set size for font
body:
Please ensure you have given all the following requested information in your report. #### Issue details app crashed #### Reproduction steps/code ```java FreeTypeFontGenerator freeTypeFontGenerator = new FreeTypeFontGenerator(GlobalSettings.getInstance().getSangoGame() .getPlatformManager().getFontFile("msyhbd.ttf")); FreeTypeFontParameter param = new FreeTypeFontParameter(); param.incremental = true; param.size = fontSize; BitmapFont defaultFont = freeTypeFontGenerator.generateFont(param); freeTypeFontGenerator.dispose(); defaultFont.getData().markupEnabled = true; skin = new Skin(); skin.addRegions(new TextureAtlas(Gdx.files.internal("data/skin/uiskin.atlas"))); skin.add("default-font", defaultFont, BitmapFont.class); skin.load(Gdx.files.internal("data/skin/uiskin.json")); ``` and later when I use ```java Table tbl = new Table(skin); tbl.add("中文") ---crashed here with Chinese chars ``` #### Version of LibGDX and/or relevant dependencies gdx 1.9.7 #### Stacktrace It's strange there is no stacktrace in logcat but I debugged it's broken with FreeTypeFontGenerator#setPixelSizes method with "Couldn't set size for font" #### Please select the affected platforms - [x] Android - [ ] iOS (robovm) - [ ] iOS (MOE) - [ ] HTML/GWT - [ ] Windows - [ ] Linux - [ ] MacOS #### FreeTypeFontGenerator says: ```java /** Generates {@link BitmapFont} and {@link BitmapFontData} instances from TrueType, OTF, and other FreeType supported fonts. *

* * Usage example: * * 
 * FreeTypeFontGenerator gen = new FreeTypeFontGenerator(Gdx.files.internal("myfont.ttf"));
 * BitmapFont font = gen.generateFont(16);
 * gen.dispose();
 *
* * The generator has to be disposed once it is no longer used. The returned {@link BitmapFont} instances are managed by the user * and have to be disposed as usual. * * @author mzechner * @author Nathan Sweet * @author Rob Rendell */ ``` But this is not right, it seems BitMappFont stills using the generator after generateFont().
